scenario_text.value:
Oh...it’s you, Minoru.
Didn’t you go off on your own somewhere?

I can’t just run off without making the
necessary preparations, now can I?
And I cannot let him go off on his own.
That’s true. Good thing Falcomon’s with you.
Hey Takuma, do you know if this is edible?
Uh...isn’t that just some weed?
Can we eat it?

Hmm... Definitely.
We can eat that.
(Minoru seems pretty sure...)
You know your stuff!
I don’t believe you.
Yeah, I guess you know this stuff.

This is pretty well-known.
Isn’t it cudweed?
It just looks a plain old weed to me.
Really? You’re not just saying that?
*chew* *chew*...
Uwaaah!
Hey, spit that out right now!

Given the unseasonal red spider lilies,
I thought this might be some cudweed...

And I was right! You can eat it. They used to
substitute it for mugwort in old recipes.

I know you know lots of weird facts, but
there are better ways to check...

It’s one of the seven famous spring flowers,
man! Who says I can’t eat it?!

We found some other plants and fruits that
look edible. We should keep looking!

Listen, I know I froze up with everything
going on, but I’m a survivalist at heart!
I wouldn’t go that far...

Hey Falcomon, this guy leaps before he looks.
So watch after him, okay?
Leave it to me!
Come on, guys, I’m RIGHT here!
Oh yeah, I found something good.
Here, Takuma, you take it.
It’s not more weeds, is it?
No, it’s not a weed! Jeez, just take it.

What’s this?
Why is something like this...

Enough with the questions.
Here, all yours.
